posts.post_content:
people talking about using this with [Distortion Strike](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Distortion Strike) but you really dont need to, this splits your deck red blue.
  
with pure red, here is the perfect circumstances (entirely possible)
  
   
turn 1, mountain
  
   
turn 2, mountain, [kiln fiend](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=kiln fiend)   
   
turn 3, [lightning bolt](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=lightning bolt) a defender, lightning bolt another defender, assault strobe on kiln fiend.
  
   
attack for 20 damage.
  
   
funzies.
posts.html:
people talking about using this with Distortion Strike but you really dont need to, this splits your deck red blue.
